announcements.message:
Good Morning Team! First of all I just want to welcome all new members to the group. The markets are opening at 5 pm EST today! 📊 As always we will be posting all of our charts in here before the market opens! 🔥  

 Tonight we will be having our Sunday Market Blitz at 8 pm EST which is a live trading session where we cover all of our technical analysis on 10+ pairs. 🎥 

 This is an amazing way to kick off the week and see where each pair could be making their next move. If there are opportunities for entry we will provide them for FREE on this live trading session 💰 

 The link will be dropped in here prior to this session and it will also be on youtube live 🚀 

 If you want to get started with any of our Premium Services please click below 👑 

 👉🏻  https://t.me/ForexLeagueMessageBot👈🏻

If you are not already inside, make sure you join our free course! Here is the link to get started! 🔗   https://t.me/ForexLeagueMessageBot
If you want to schedule a one on one with us this week please use this link to check out the times that are available <https://calendly.com/angelo-23/forexleaguecall>

The broker that we use is Nash Markets 🌍 They offer low spreads and commissions, BTC withdraws/despoits, 1:500 leverage, ECN Accounts, and you can trade forex, crypto, commodities, indices and stocks. If you want help getting set up with them we put together a few videos to get you started! <https://myforexleague.teachable.com/p/broker>

 Check out the competition site for more details. One lucky winner is going to get this great monitor for as little as $10 🔥🤯 Good Luck everyone! <https://www.royal-raffles.com/product-page/lg-34in-monitor>
